welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Los Bajos, Chile! This charming city nestled between the mountains and the sea is known for its vibrant culture, delicious food, and breathtaking scenery. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Los Bajos has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frutillar Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at Frutillar Airport offers exclusive services for high-end travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tepual Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tepual Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
